root.title: Checklist
root.scenario:
A checklist page gives you multiple options to choose from with one or more options being selectable and one or more options being correct.

Feedback is available on submission, along with "why feedback" which is specific to an option.
root.question: This is where you prefix the activity with a statement or question.
